subtests.name: pen pointerevent attributes
pen pointerover's type should be pointerover
pen pointerover's button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerover's buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerover's ClientX and ClientY attributes are correct.
pen pointerover.pointerType is correct.
pen pointerover event is a PointerEvent event
pen pointerover.fromElement value is null
pen pointerover.toElement value is null
pen pointerover.isTrusted value is true
pen pointerover.composed value is valid
pen pointerover.bubbles value is valid
pen pointerover.cancelable value is valid
pen pointerover.pressure value is valid
pen pointerover properties for pointerType = mouse
pen pointerover.isPrimary attribute is correct.
pen pointerenter's type should be pointerenter
pen pointerenter's button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerenter's buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
pen pointerenter's ClientX and ClientY attributes are correct.
pen pointerenter.pointerType is correct.
pen pointerenter event is a PointerEvent event
pen pointerenter.fromElement value is null
pen pointerenter.toElement value is null
pen pointerenter.isTrusted value is true
pen pointerenter.composed value is valid
pen pointerenter.bubbles value is valid
pen pointerenter.cancelable value is valid
pen pointerenter.pressure value is valid
pen pointerenter properties for pointerType = mouse
pen pointerenter.isPrimary attribute is correct.
pen pointerenter.pointerId should be the same as previous pointer events for this active pointer.
